attributes.action: Enforce Government Funding for the Air Ambulance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that such a valuable and life saving service as the Air Ambulance should receive some form of government funding as at present they are totally dependant on charitable donations. The Air Ambulance has saved so many lives at present, but this will not be able to continue if the funding dries up. Sign this petition and help save lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
